Default:
"use client";

import * as React from "react";
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
import {
  DropdownMenu,
  DropdownMenuContent,
  DropdownMenuGroup,
  DropdownMenuItem,
  DropdownMenuLabel,
  DropdownMenuPortal,
  DropdownMenuSeparator,
  DropdownMenuShortcut,
  DropdownMenuSub,
  DropdownMenuSubContent,
  DropdownMenuSubTrigger,
  DropdownMenuTrigger,
} from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu";

export default function DefaultDemo() {
  return (
    <DropdownMenu id="dropdown-menu-default">
      <DropdownMenuTrigger id="dropdown-menu-trigger" asChild>
        <Button variant="outline" colorScheme="neutral">
          Open
        </Button>
      </DropdownMenuTrigger>
      <DropdownMenuContent id="dropdown-menu-content" align="start" className="w-56">
        <DropdownMenuLabel id="dropdown-menu-label">My Account</DropdownMenuLabel>
        <DropdownMenuGroup id="dropdown-menu-group-1">
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-profile">
            Profile
            <DropdownMenuShortcut>⇧⌘P</DropdownMenuShortcut>
          </DropdownMenuItem>
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-billing">
            Billing
            <DropdownMenuShortcut>⌘B</DropdownMenuShortcut>
          </DropdownMenuItem>
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-settings">
            Settings
            <DropdownMenuShortcut>⌘S</DropdownMenuShortcut>
          </DropdownMenuItem>
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-keyboard">
            Keyboard shortcuts
            <DropdownMenuShortcut>⌘K</DropdownMenuShortcut>
          </DropdownMenuItem>
        </DropdownMenuGroup>
        <DropdownMenuSeparator id="dropdown-menu-separator-1" />
        <DropdownMenuGroup id="dropdown-menu-group-2">
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-team">Team</DropdownMenuItem>
          <DropdownMenuSub id="dropdown-menu-sub-invite">
            <DropdownMenuSubTrigger id="dropdown-menu-sub-trigger-invite">Invite users</DropdownMenuSubTrigger>
            <DropdownMenuPortal>
              <DropdownMenuSubContent id="dropdown-menu-sub-content-invite">
                <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-email">Email</DropdownMenuItem>
                <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-message">Message</DropdownMenuItem>
                <DropdownMenuSeparator />
                <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-more">More...</DropdownMenuItem>
              </DropdownMenuSubContent>
            </DropdownMenuPortal>
          </DropdownMenuSub>
          <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-new-team">
            New Team
            <DropdownMenuShortcut>⌘+T</DropdownMenuShortcut>
          </DropdownMenuItem>
        </DropdownMenuGroup>
        <DropdownMenuSeparator id="dropdown-menu-separator-2" />
        <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-github">GitHub</DropdownMenuItem>
        <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-support">Support</DropdownMenuItem>
        <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-api" disabled>API</DropdownMenuItem>
        <DropdownMenuSeparator id="dropdown-menu-separator-3" />
        <DropdownMenuItem id="dropdown-menu-item-logout">
          Log out
          <DropdownMenuShortcut>⇧⌘Q</DropdownMenuShortcut>
        </DropdownMenuItem>
      </DropdownMenuContent>
    </DropdownMenu>
  );
}
